ygData.subject: Re: Hot Rod vs Optimus Prime
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Dont push me! I dont want to finish you off. And I refuse to call you that. I know the real you is in there somewhere, and I ll bring it out. I m not

Subject: Re: Hot Rod vs Optimus Prime
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
From: RoboRick007 <rfa007@...>

::Hot Rod::

"Dont push me! I dont want to finish you off. And I refuse to call you
that. I know the real you is in there somewhere, and I'll bring it out.
I'm not giving up on you Optimus Prime! I failed you twice, already. I
got you killed by Megatron, and then I failed to live up to your
standerds as Autobot commander. This time I'm going to help you. I'll
bring you back Optimus, I swear it!"
